name: Streamlit Langchain Vectorstore
description: A chatbot built on streamlit and langchain. It is a playground to compare using other vector stores like REDIS, Mongo.
readme:
This demo uses langchain. OpenAI and Streamlit. Uses langchain's Youtube loader to extract text from the video and summarize chain to summarize the video.

Run the demo locally

pip install -r requirements.txt

streamlit run summarizer.py
